name: Back to the Office 2020
description:
NEWS «The quarantine has ended! This means it's time to go back to work after a long break. But wait a minute… It seems that some townspeople have gone mad during their isolation! Now, freely going out into the streets of the city, they leave the sewer hatches open for you to fall into them, throw things out of the windows so that they fall on you, run through the streets, shout if you come close to their children, and are just ready to beat you for what you’re here. So now, if you want to get to work on time, you have to overcome all obstacles and survive in this crazy post-quarantine city.» CREATORS Ksan (coder/author of idea) Tim DN (artist/animator) Freesound.org, Internet (sound effects) Oscar Owl (music) The game is made for My First GameJam POST SCRIPTUM Perhaps, the game will be improved over time. Maybe even its creators will make a full version, but we aren’t sure.
Please be careful during a pandemic! Wash your hands, wear masks and keep your distance in the real world too! Good luck.

25.07.2020
